headnotes: A commitment not stating on its face any offence, is not evidence of a commitment for felony, altliongli -written on the back of a warrant of arrest charging a felony, but not referring to it.
summary: Indictment for breaking gaol, when committed for felony in stealing a saddle. The commitment did not state any offence, but was written on the back of the warrant of arrest, which -charged a felony. The commitment did not refer to the warrant of arrest.

opinions.opinion_text:
The Court
(nem. con.) said, that it Was no evidence of a commitment for felony.
Verdict, not guilty.

court_short_name: U.S. Circuit Court for the District of District of Columbia
court_full_name: U.S. Circuit Court for the District of District of Columbia
